hit: Its chipped blade digs into your side.
miss: It lets loose a growl as it sword goes wide of you

alive: A rotting corpse stands before you, heavy with the stench of ancient preservatives. Even in death it has a certain dignity about it.
The mummy exhales a rattling breath and lurches toward you, a golden sickle-sword clutched in his hand.
dead: The mummy lies on the floor, limp and motionless.
